name: SEARCH ALL - SNAILS
description:
SEARCH ALL - SNAILS

is a hidden object game in which you need to find all the snails in a large location. The snails will be located in a variety of places, from the most prominent to barely noticeable places. The whole game location looks lively because of the animation elements. Find all the snails! Don't let them go unnoticed :)

Key Features:
- Animation elements on location;
- 100 snails to find;
- Pleasant soundtrack;
- The gameplay can be interrupted at any time, and the game will automatically save the result;
- Implemented hints! If you find it difficult to find an item, use the hint!
